thread.title: U-M vs. MSU game set for 3:30 p.m.
thread.title_full: U-M vs. MSU game set for 3:30 p.m.

title: U-M vs. MSU game set for 3:30 p.m.
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest U-M vs. MSU game set for 3:30 p.m. The highly anticipated Michigan vs. Michigan State will kick off at 3:30 p.m. on Oct. 17 at Michigan Stadium. The network will be announced next Post to Facebook U-M vs. MSU game set for 3:30 p.m. The highly anticipated Michigan vs. Michigan State will kick off at 3:30 p.m. on Oct. 17 at Michigan Stadium. The network will be announced next Check out this story on lansingstatejournal.com: http://on.lsj.com/1Le397T Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs U-M vs. MSU game set for 3:30 p.m. Mark Snyder, Detroit Free Press 11:53 a.m. EDT October 5, 2015 Michigan State's Javon Ringer races away from Michigan's Mike Martin and Jonas Mouton, right, for a touchdown in an October 25, 2008 game at Michigan Stadium in Ann Arbor. (Photo: File photo) 
The highly anticipated Michigan vs. Michigan State will kick off at 3:30 p.m. on Oct. 17 at Michigan Stadium. 
The network will be announced next week, likely depending on the result of the Michigan-Northwestern game. If the Wolverines win, there's a chance for a larger national audience with two Top 15 teams. 
With the 5-0 Spartans ranked No. 4 in the Associated Press poll and the 4-1 Wolverines at No. 18, this has the potential to be the highest-ranked matchup in years. 
U-M was No. 23 and MSU was No. 24 in 2013 -- MSU's 29-6 win in East Lansing -- but the last time the two were both ranked in the Top 20 was 2010 when U-M was 18 and MSU 17. The Spartans also won that game, 34-17. ABC, ESPN or ESPN2 will televise Michigan State's Oct. 17 game at Michigan, with kickoff set for 3:30 pm ET. (TV network TBD after Oct. 10). â€” Spartan Football (@MSU_Football) October 5, 2015 Read or Share this story: http://on.lsj.com/1Le397T TOP VIDEOS
